feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -19.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 1:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -19.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.6°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
